verses.verse: I <S%G4921>commend<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5402>Phoebe,<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G79>sister,<s%> who <S%G5607>is<s%> a <S%G1249>servant<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> that <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2747>Cenchreae,<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> you <S%G4327>receive<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> in a way <S%G516>worthy<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you <S%G3936>assist<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302>whatever<s%> <S%G4229>matter<s%> <S%G846>she<s%> may <S%G5535>need<s%> from <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>she<s%> <S%G3778>herself<s%> also has <S%G1096>been<s%> a helper of <S%G4183>many,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G846>my<s%> own <S%G1700>self.<s%>

<S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G5294><s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>life,<s%> laid <S%G5294>down<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5137>necks;<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> give <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>assemblies<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Greet the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> that is <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G1866>Epaenetus,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the first <S%G536>fruits<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G559>Apelles,<s%> the <S%G1384>approved<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> those who <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the household of <S%G711>Aristobulus.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G4648>look<s%> out for those who are <S%G4160>causing<s%> the <S%G1370>divisions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> occasions of <S%G4625>stumbling,<s%> contrary <S%G3844>to<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3129>learned,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> turn <S%G1578>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> those who are <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2836>belly;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> their <S%G5542>smooth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> flattering <S%G2129>speech,<s%> they <S%G1818>deceive<s%> the <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of the <S%G172>innocent.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> has become known <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%> I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G2309>have<s%> <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> that which is <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G185>innocent<s%> in <S%G1519>that<s%> which is <S%G2556>evil.<s%>

<S%G1050>Gaius,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3581>host<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> host of <S%G1577>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1577>assembly,<s%> greets <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G2037>Erastus,<s%> <S%G1577>the<s%> <S%G3623>treasurer<s%> of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G782>greets<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>as<s%> does <S%G2890>Quartus,<s%> the <S%G80>brother.<s%>
